thread.title: Germany Says Utilities’ Reserves Adequate for Nuclear-Power Exit
thread.title_full: Germany Says Utilities’ Reserves Adequate for Nuclear-Power Exit - WSJ

author: Stefan Lange
title: Germany Says Utilities’ Reserves Adequate for Nuclear-Power Exit
text:
FRANKFURT—German utilities’ reserves for the country’s planned exit from nuclear power are adequate, the ministry for economics and energy said, citing a government-commissioned report on the matter.
“The affected companies have fully covered the costs with the designated provisions,” economics minister Sigmar Gabriel said in a statement.
The Federal Ministry of Economic Affairs and Energy had called for the stress test to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
